label: 念仏
対訳語: recitation of a buddha's name, the contemplation of a buddha
本: Alms and Vagabonds: Buddhist Temples and Popular Patronage in Medieval Japan . University of Hawai'i Press . 1994
説明文: Sanskrit: buddha-manasikāra. In medieval Japan, the term was often used to refer specifically to the recitation of a buddha's name.
